title: Hannibal Meriadec And The Tears Of Odin T01 - T02 (2011) (Dragon
description:
Hannibal Meriadec Captain Mac Lir, pirate and witch, covets 7 diamonds of a size unlikely. The legend tells that Odin, the father of the gods, when he lost his daughter, wept tears 7. These seven tears escaped from Titan's eyes fell to the earth and became one of seven diamonds of unprecedented purity. An ancestor of Hannibal testifies in a manuscript of the existence of these precious stones. But the latter are also sought by an old order, secret order from the axis. An Order that will do anything to get their hands on this treasure. And if the crew of Meriadec be seen already rich, Hannibal intended the property has a different goal. For the love of his life traveling with her ... Selina ... The memory of its beauty haunts him, but now, her figure hidden walks the Mac Lir.

enjoy
